
Test: vcmpss EQ (equal)
Operand A: 0x3F800000 0x40000000 0x40400000 0x40800000 
Operand B: 0x3F800000 0x40000000 0x40400000 0x40800000 
Expected: 0xFFFFFFFF 0x00000000 0x00000000 0x00000000 
Result  : 0xFFFFFFFF 0x40000000 0x40400000 0x40800000 
Result: PASS

Test: vcmpss NEQ (not equal)
Operand A: 0x3F800000 0x40000000 0x40400000 0x40800000 
Operand B: 0x00000000 0x40400000 0x40000000 0x40A00000 
Expected: 0xFFFFFFFF 0x00000000 0x00000000 0x00000000 
Result  : 0xFFFFFFFF 0x40000000 0x40400000 0x40800000 
Result: PASS

Test: vcmpss LT (less than)
Operand A: 0x3F800000 0x40400000 0x40A00000 0x40E00000 
Operand B: 0x40000000 0x3F800000 0x40A00000 0x40C00000 
Expected: 0xFFFFFFFF 0x00000000 0x00000000 0x00000000 
Result  : 0xFFFFFFFF 0x40400000 0x40A00000 0x40E00000 
Result: PASS

Test: vcmpss UNORD (unordered)
Operand A: 0x3F800000 0x7FC00000 0x40400000 0x40800000 
Operand B: 0x7FC00000 0x40000000 0x7FC00000 0x7FC00000 
Expected: 0xFFFFFFFF 0x00000000 0x00000000 0x00000000 
Result  : 0xFFFFFFFF 0x7FC00000 0x40400000 0x40800000 
Result: PASS

Test: vcmpss ORD (ordered)
Operand A: 0x3F800000 0x7FC00000 0x40400000 0x40800000 
Operand B: 0x40000000 0x7FC00000 0x40400000 0x7FC00000 
Expected: 0xFFFFFFFF 0x00000000 0x00000000 0x00000000 
Result  : 0xFFFFFFFF 0x7FC00000 0x40400000 0x40800000 
Result: PASS

Test: vcmpss EQ with inf
Operand A: 0x7F800000 0xFF800000 0x42C80000 0xC2C80000 
Operand B: 0x42C80000 0xC2C80000 0x7F800000 0xFF800000 
Expected: 0x00000000 0x00000000 0x00000000 0x00000000 
Result  : 0x00000000 0xFF800000 0x42C80000 0xC2C80000 
Result: PASS

Test: vcmpss with memory operand
Operand A: 0x3F800000 0x40000000 0x40400000 0x40800000 
Operand B (mem): 0x3F800000 0x40000000 0x40400000 0x40800000 
Expected: 0xFFFFFFFF 0x00000000 0x00000000 0x00000000 
Result  : 0xFFFFFFFF 0x40000000 0x40400000 0x40800000 
Result: PASS

Summary: 7/7 tests passed
